SageTVPlugin.Name: Live PVR Data Server
SageTVPlugin.Description: Provides Sports Event monitoring for use by the SRE plugin
SageTVPlugin.Author: skiingwiz
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: 1.8.1 * Fix WNBA monitor assignment 1.8 * Add supprot for WNBA 1.7 * Add support for Women's College Basketball 1.6 * Add experimental support for college baseball 1.5.1 * Fix College Basketball Monitoring support * Update to support all Division-I Men's College Baseketball (Was only Top 25) 1.4.1 * Updated NFL teams 1.4 * Add experimental support for college softball 1.3.1 * Fix College Football monitor showing start time only * Enable support for Formula One and NASCAR monitors 1.2 * Update to support all College Football (Was only Top 25) 1.1 * Add NCAA overrides map * Add support for updating maps without clearing derby database * New overrides servlet for displaying alternative names 1.0.1 * Fix Detroit Tigers typo * Fix incorrect display name on Jetty /apps page 1.0 * First release for sage server
